caseStudyDetailsPage.heading: Making Indian Chai a Mainstream In the UK With eCommerce Technology
caseStudyDetailsPage.content:
Entrepreneurial minds can reach anywhere to find solutions, and Techtic is always ready to back them up with the best technology to make their products/services visible to their end customers. This time we got to help a recently launched Tea brand in London with user-friendly website development that enables them to reach a wider audience.

The founder has a strong motive to eliminate intermediaries and bridge the gap between customers who yearn for authentic Indian tea and spices taste in London and farmers who harvest them. To make this simple, the client needed a custom web app where they could show their journey, how the tea and spices are sourced directly from the Indian ground, and the values they adhere to. All while letting customers shop for their favorite chai and accessories easily.

In order to craft a pleasing shopping experience for the client’s customers, Techtic tailored personalized web navigations that also drive more conversions. Since the products had to be presented attractively, our team also fine-tuned the entire user journey and design according to the brand’s nature.

ourProcess.heading: Our Process
ourProcess.content: Heart of our process is transparency and we take our customers through the process to ensure they become part of the journey in product development.

featuresListsForWeb.heading: Authentication
featuresListsForWeb.content: Users will have to create their account on the platform, to shop for masala chai or any accessories though we have made it very simple. Users can register by using their name, email, and password and log in using the same email address and password in a few moments.

featuresListsForWeb.heading: Shop the best
featuresListsForWeb.content: By clicking on “Shop,” users can access the masala chai and accessories catalog or view all available products for sale at once by selecting “shop all.”

featuresListsForWeb.heading: Interactive Menu
featuresListsForWeb.content: It is an ultimate area that allows users to navigate through the list of products, blogs, newsletters, and more with just one click.

featuresListsForWeb.heading: Product details
featuresListsForWeb.content: From the first look of the tea products on the category page to exploring insights into it, such as what it contains, how to make them, where teas came from, and reviews, all information is presented in an interactive way to elevate user engagement.

featuresListsForWeb.heading: Add to cart
featuresListsForWeb.content: Once users check out all the details, they can easily set the quantity, add the item to the shopping cart, or choose to check out instantly with “buy now.”

featuresListsForWeb.heading: Contact Us
featuresListsForWeb.content: The brand is driven by the mission “to make the best tasting masala chai by directly sourcing premium tea and spices from sustainable farms in India,” and if any user or customers want to connect with them, they can quickly leave their details with a personalized message through the contact form on the platform.

featuresListsForWeb.heading: Easy Checkout
featuresListsForWeb.content: After adding the products with the required quantity to the cart, customers can quickly proceed to checkout by entering the address and paying via cards.

featuresListsForWeb.heading: My Account
featuresListsForWeb.content: Customers can manage their order history, track their orders, manage subscriptions, add shipping and billing addresses, review payments, and manage their entire profile on the platform from here.

featuresListsForWeb.heading: Loyalty
featuresListsForWeb.content: The brand also allows its loyal customers to earn and redeem points for purchasing their products on the platform under the loyalty program.

featuresListsForWeb.heading: Blogs
featuresListsForWeb.content: In this space, users can access informative articles on different categories related to tea and its accessories with high readability and illustrative images. Users can also easily share articles with their friends or family through social media with one click.

featuresListsForWeb.heading: Newsletter
featuresListsForWeb.content: By entering an email address, any user can subscribe to the newsletter and be the first to know about new recipes, the latest product updates, offers, and more with real-time alerts and email notifications.

featuresListsForWeb.heading: Locate store
featuresListsForWeb.content: The brand has several stores where customers can visit to have their favorite cup of tea, and this section will help them find a nearby store to their location.

featuresListsForWeb.heading: About us
featuresListsForWeb.content: From the brand origin to how they source fine teas, what values they follow, and how they get the idea of the brand, everything is presented in a very engaging and appealing way that users will enjoy reading about the company.

caseStudyDetailsPage.specialFeaturesContent:
• Dashboard to provide an analytical overview of the digital store;
  • Different categories of tea and accessories management;
  • Efficient function to manage sales, product, and customer reports;
  • Manage digital content (images, videos, text) to display on the user side;
  • Order management
  • Easy-to-manage CMS
  • Customer requests and loyalty point management
  • Payment transaction and order status management
  • Create and run marketing campaigns
  • Manage terms and conditions of the store

problemChallengesResultLists.heading: Problem
problemChallengesResultLists.content: The client had come up with a unique concept of offering 100% authentic tea and spices by sourcing from Assam and West Bengal all the way to the UK. However, they started confronting challenges to gain visibility and brand awareness in their target locations. Since the world population is driven by mobile and web technology, the client needed to establish a robust digital presence on the web.

problemChallengesResultLists.heading: Challenges
problemChallengesResultLists.content:
When the client met and discussed their problems with us, we orchestrated a highly responsive and engaging digital storefront using the elite Shopify platform. Our team coordinated and brainstormed with the client and agreed upon building a platform with user-friendly and interactive interfaces, making the entire exploring to checkout process engaging for customers. Nevertheless, while preparing project requirement documents and a blueprint, we overcame the challenges below.

  • Create a customized theme and design to align the brand values;
  • Keep product category and details accessible quickly;
  • Ensure responsiveness across numerous devices;
  • Enable selection of multiple items to add in one order;
  • Social media sharing option on every product;
  • Unique marketing functions and admin features for the store handling;
  • Enhance the visibility of the brand story and vision to increase customer trust.

problemChallengesResultLists.heading: Result
problemChallengesResultLists.content:
Multiple brainstorming sessions and iterations paid off when we heard satisfactory words from the client. Finally, the client got a platform where they can easily add new products and attract more customers, all while spreading awareness of their unique brand story. Their brand has become the talk of the town, and customers are ordering authentic masala teas, spices, and traditional accessories sourced right from the origin progressively.

Everything is delivered as the client expected, from the product catalog, site navigation, features, navigation flow, and design to checkout and marketing options. Therefore, now they are growing with a snowball effect.

weFollowAgile.heading: We Follow Agile
weFollowAgile.content: We encourage candid discussions and would be happy to offer consultation to understand and address your pain areas.

pageContext.title: Shopify Development – UK-Based Indian Chai Mainstream
